testcase.name: BeforeStories
Given User on home page
When User verifies Menu bar should not Move while pageload
Then User verifies left Header contains:
Then User verifies right Header contains:
Scenario: Test case -Accelerator
Accelerator.story
Given User on home page​
When User Hover over on 'Country' text
Then panel must show Regions in the 1st panel and their countries in the 2nd panel 2 column countries list must be displayed
Then Depending upon which country the page belongs to, pin must appear against it
Scenario: Show regions and its countries
testcase.classname: Scenario: Show regions and its countries

testcase.name: CountryList.story
Given User on home page​​
When User hover on Menu Bar shows primary panel with categories
Then User hover on primary categories panel shows secondary panel
Then User hover on Secondary panel should show categerioes and direct links with arrow pointing
Scenario: Test case -Menu
Menu.story
Given User on home page​​​
When User Not signed In
Then User see the text 'Sign In' must be displayed
When User Hover over 'Sign In'
Then User see the panel must slide down showing two account options 'Oracle Account' and 'Cloud Account'
Then User verify Oracle Account must have options:
Then User verify Cloud Account must have only option:
Then User Click on Cloud Account each links:

testcase.name: Given User on home page​​​​
When User begins to type keyword 'ora' in search box autosuggest must suggest options
Then User start entering keyword 'jav' again and autosuggest must reappear
Then User Enters keyword 'oracle' and hit enter results must be displayed in 'Oracle.com Search' page
Then User Enters keyword 'jav' and click search icon results must be displayed in 'Oracle.com Search' page
Then User Enters keyword 'oracle' and once autosuggestion appears, click outside the search field and verify that the autosuggest retracts
Scenario: Test case -Search Autosuggestion
SearchAutosuggestion.story
Given User on home page​​​​​
When User click inside the search box must show the cursor
Then User checks Without entering any text in the search box hit return key Search field must flash in red and disappear
Then User text is type 'jav' in the search box options must be displayed to choose
Then User Click on the 'java me' options should navigate to 'Oracle.com Search' page
Scenario: Test case -Search Box
SearchBox.story
Given User on home page​​​​​​
When User Signed In
Then User see the Text 'Account' must be displayed
When User Hover Over 'Account'
Then User see the panel must slide down showing two Account options 'Oracle Account' and 'Cloud Account'
Then User verify Oracle account must have options:
Then User verify Cloud account must have only option:
Then User Click on Cloud Account each links:​
